disabled.description: If `true`, the radio will be disabled

invalid.description: If `true`, the radio is marked as invalid.

readOnly.description: If `true`, the radio will be readonly

disabled.description: If `true`, the radio group will be disabled

form.description: The associate form of the underlying input.

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  label: string
  radio(value: string): string
  radioLabel(value: string): string
  radioControl(value: string): string
  radioInput(value: string): string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the radio. Useful for composition.

name.description:
The name of the input fields in the radio
(Useful for form submission).

onChange.description: Function called once a radio is checked

readOnly.description: If `true`, the radio group will be readonly

value.description: The value of the checked radio

blur.description: Function to blur the currently focused radio input in the radio group

clearValue.description: Function to clear the value of the radio group

focus.description: Function to focus the radio group

getRadioState.type:
<T_1 extends RadioProps>(
  props: T_1,
) => {
  isInteractive: boolean
  isReadOnly: boolean | undefined
  isInvalid: boolean | undefined
  isDisabled: boolean | undefined
  isChecked: boolean
  isFocused: boolean
  isHovered: boolean
  isActive: boolean
}
getRadioState.description: Returns the state details of a radio input

setValue.description: Function to set the value of the radio group

value.description: The current value of the radio group
